newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Creative announces video web phone.
newsitem.headline: Creative announces video web phone.

text.p: Multi-media company Creative Technology announced on Wednesday a software-based PC Internet telephone that is priced at under U.S.$10.

Creative said in an announcement that its Creative Video WebPhone, Personal Version, is available at an introductory price of $9.95. It described the product as easy to use, and enabling users to see and speak to another person anywhere in the world for the price of a local Internet connection.
Users see the person they are speaking with in full colour at up to 12 frames a second, Creative said.
Creative said it would sell the unit through its distribution network in mid-March. A more advanced version would be available for $49.95, it said.
